recipe.notes:
**UNTRIED**
A recipe from my Uncle Patrick's "bachelor days", which were long and varied. Somewhere exists a recipe for Tuna Surprise which contained lots of strange things such as peas (not to mention "hot tuna") but was generally pretty tasty. Sadly I wouldn't rediscover this recipe until well -after- college.
recipe.name: Pork Chops Patrice
recipe.preparation: Brown pork chops, add wine and simmer for a while. In a large pyrex baking dish, spread soup evenly and add rest of ingredients. Place chops on top of sauce and bake at 350ยบ for 15 minutes. When sauce has thinned a little and is bubbly, spoon over chops and continue to bake another 10 minutes.
